column4: how do i make a windows on all desktops? right click on the title bar doesn't help
Right click on the icon at the top left of the title bar - there is a menu and there is an option 'visible on all workspaces'
the menu shows only "minimize maximize ontop move resize close", i'm using Xgl
For me I see other options below the minimize/maximize/blah/close options - I've got Desktop-effects enabled on feisty
